backend/main.mo: Motoko actor with access control that stores user profiles, allowing users to save their own profile and admins to view others' profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes and applying base body styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the page title and loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling view routing, print mode detection, header navigation, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/GuidanceNoticeBa: Notice bar component showing a draft-link warning with a button to copy the current URL.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/Balan: Daily Totals view showing selectable days, total revenue, and per‑item quantity breakdown using stored ledger data.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/hooks: React hook that loads available ledger days, selects a day, and computes that day's total revenue and item quantities.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/ledge: LocalStorage-backed utilities for storing ledger entries, computing daily totals, and managing persisted daily summaries.
frontend/src/features/calculator/billCod: Generates a unique timestamped bill code with a 4‑character suffix.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines the CatalogItem interface and provides a predefined list of menu items with prices and categories.
Provides helpers for formatting numbers and currency in INR style.
frontend/src/features/calculator/lineIte: Provides helpers to normalize labels, find matching line items, and sum quantities for a catalog item.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: UI component for browsing, filtering, grouping, and managing predefined catalog items, including adding new items and handling images.
Type definitions for the PredefinedItemCatalog component’s props and callbacks.
frontend/src/features/calculator/PrintBi: Print-only bill receipt component that renders line items and the totals breakdown for printing.
frontend/src/features/calculator/savedBi: Manages saving, retrieving, and clearing bill records in localStorage with generated IDs and timestamps.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator page handling line items, catalog interactions, totals calculation, bill saving, and ledger updates.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: Defines types for line items, calculator state, and calculation breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Implements number parsing, clamping, line total calculation, subtotal computation, and full bill breakdown.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils/r: Reads an image file and returns its data URL or errors if invalid.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/Optim: UI page for configuring default receipt settings, uploading payment scans, and saving preferences.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/optim: Loads and saves bill format defaults to localStorage with validation and fallback behavior.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/recei: Defines available receipt styles and the default style.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useOp: React hook for loading and updating bill format defaults.
frontend/src/features/print/PrintViewPag: Loads a saved bill, triggers printing, and manages loading, error, and post-print states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyCurrentUrl.ts: Provides a helper to copy the current URL using clipboard APIs with fallback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider wrapping Dfinity AuthClient to manage Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with CSS variables for light/dark themes plus print-specific formatting rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, wraps it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/confirmDelete.ts: Simple helper showing a confirmation dialog before deletion.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors and radii based on CSS variables and enabling additional plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s bill‑printing enhancements, requirements, and stored architectural notes.
